name: ISConnects: Social Sculpting: Art Shapes Life Shapes Room
content: The International Sculpture Center in collaboration with The College of New Jersey will present ISConnects: Social Sculpting: Art Shapes Life Shapes Room on February 13, 2015 from 12:30-1:30PM at The College of New Jersey. Join artist Chloe Bass as she explores the idea of social sculpture. This event is free and open to the public. Visit www.sculpture.org/isconnects for more information, or contact the ISC Events Department at (609) 689-1051 x302 or events@sculpture.org.
